text:
Adding a divider module into a drag and drop area template but I can't set the width to 100 because it's trying to use width= as the module width instead of the divider width thus getting the error _"DnD module spanning row columns 1 to 100 exceeds max row width of 12"._ Any way around this other than cloning the module and changing the name of the width field?

```{% dnd_module "divider" path="@HubSpot/divider", height=1, width=100, alignment="center", color={"color": "#E4E4E4"} %}{% end_dnd_module %}```
